content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1451761032806{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1449147431196{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1594662800974{padding-right: 10px !important;}”]

Excellence by Design.

TTI Medical specializes in video and digital camera adaptation onto surgical microscopes, ophthalmic slit lamps, and endoscopes. In addition, we manufacture various CO₂ laser accessories, fiberoptic handpieces, and re-usable suction/irrigation instruments.

TTI Medical is a distributor of Ikegami and Sony medical video cameras for surgical microscopes & ophthalmic slit lamps in the United States. We are also distributors of personal protective equipment (PPE).

TTI Medical was established in 1984 with the mission of designing and marketing high quality, technologically advanced surgical instruments and medical devices. Our product design criteria must pass critical tests for performance, convenience, dependability, and cost containment. Product quality is held to the highest standards. Opportunities within the medical marketplace are constantly being identified and evaluated for new product development. Patents protect the proprietary technology utilized in the ACCU-Beam® and ACCU-Surg® product lines. The fundamental principal of “universality” is incorporated in each product design. Universality ensures the end user of maximum utilization at the lowest possible cost. Our philosophy of producing high quality reusable surgical devices focuses on the cost containment criteria required within the hospital managed care environment.

Our quality policy is to provide products that satisfy the requirements of our customers including regulatory, design, and cost specifications. Products shall be produced under a management system in compliance with quality standards of ISO 13485:2016, FDA/GMP and shall comply with the Medical Devices Directive 93/42/EEC.  Our policy is to be in compliance with all regulations that apply to the products in countries where our products are distributed. Products shall only be released if they conform to specifications without functional defect.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1451760818909{padding-top: 14px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”71119″ img_size=”full” onclick=”img_link_large”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1449574756848{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”70938″ img_size=”full” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/TTI-13485.pdf”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1449574764907{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”74059″ img_size=”full” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/CE-Auth-Rep-2020.pdf”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]REGISTRATION:

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.

Our products are approved to bear the CE mark.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_page_width_inner_container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1568660387929{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #63c3ce !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

TTI Medical was established in 1984 with the mission of designing and marketing high quality, technologically advanced surgical instruments and medical devices.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
